short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Identify record labels on Beatport which are available on LabelsBase

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The extension adds an icon near all the LabelsBase-available labels on beatport.com, so you can easily find the label contacts, links, description etc.
